result.eng: Do you like eating in restaurants?
result.ga: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialanna
result.orig: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialanna
result.html: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialannaDo you like eating in restaurants?
result.ponchtml: An maiṫ liḃ ḃeiṫ ag iṫe i mbialannaDo you like eating in restaurants?

result.eng: Do you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?
result.ga: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaile
result.orig: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaile
result.html: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaileDo you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?
result.ponchtml: An iṫeann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireaċt sa ḃaileDo you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?

result.eng: The restaurant is located at a busy crossroads.
result.ga: Ar chrosaire gnóthach atá an bhialann suite
result.orig: Ar chrosaire gnóthach atá an bhialann suite
result.html: Ar chrosaire gnóthach atá an bhialann suiteThe restaurant is located at a busy crossroads.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċrosaire gnóṫaċ atá an ḃialann suiteThe restaurant is located at a busy crossroads.

result.eng: I was serving people in the restaurant all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fad
result.orig: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fad
result.html: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fadI was serving people in the restaurant all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag freastal ar ḋaoine sa ḃialann an lá ar fadI was serving people in the restaurant all day.

result.eng: The restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.
result.ga: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóin
result.orig: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóin
result.html: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóinThe restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an ḃialann gnóṫaċ go leor ag am lóinThe restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.

result.eng: We are in the restaurant each day.
result.ga: Bíonn muid sa mbialann gach lá
result.orig: Bíonn muid sa mbialann gach lá
result.html: Bíonn muid sa mbialann gach láWe are in the restaurant each day.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn muid sa mbialann gaċ láWe are in the restaurant each day.

result.eng: I hear that that restaurant is nice.
result.ga: Cloisim go bhfuil an bhialann sin go deas
result.orig: Cloisim go bhfuil an bhialann sin go deas
result.html: Cloisim go bhfuil an bhialann sin go deasI hear that that restaurant is nice.
result.ponchtml: Cloisim go ḃfuil an ḃialann sin go deasI hear that that restaurant is nice.

result.eng: I am working as a waiter in a restaurant.
result.ga: Tá mé ag obair mar fhreastalaí i mbialann
result.orig: Tá mé ag obair mar fhreastalaí i mbialann
result.html: Tá mé ag obair mar fhreastalaí i mbialannI am working as a waiter in a restaurant.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag obair mar ḟreastalaí i mbialannI am working as a waiter in a restaurant.

result.eng: There are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.html: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámhaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna maiṫe ann ionad siopadóireaċta cúpla teaċ táḃairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snáṁaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.

result.eng: Sometimes I have dinner in a restaurant with my friends.
result.ga: Uaireanta bíonn dinnéar agam i mbialann le mo chairde
result.orig: Uaireanta bíonn dinnéar agam i mbialann le mo chairde
result.html: Uaireanta bíonn dinnéar agam i mbialann le mo chairdeSometimes I have dinner in a restaurant with my friends.
result.ponchtml: Uaireanta bíonn dinnéar agam i mbialann le mo ċairdeSometimes I have dinner in a restaurant with my friends.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
